JoinRequestDialog.title: Lowani m'chipindacho
JoinRequestDialog.inviteOnly: Ichi ndi chipinda chachinsinsi ndipo chimafuna kuyitanira kujowina
JoinRequestDialog.knockRequired: Chipinda chino chimafuna kugwiritsa ntchito. Dinani batani pansipa kuti mutumize
JoinRequestDialog.canJoin: Ichi ndi chipinda cha anthu, mutha kulowa mwachindunji

MessageList.noMessages: Palibe uthenga pano, tumizani uthenga woyamba kuyambitsa zokambirana!

MessageVirturalList.noMessages: Palibe uthenga pano, tumizani uthenga woyamba kuyambitsa zokambirana!
